attributes.action: Remove The Pro-Tibet Independent Artworks For Graduation Exhibition in UAL
attributes.additional_details: During the exhibition of the graduation for arts London, there were photography works which were exhibited which has against the majority of the best interests of international students from China. As a graduation piece of work only contain three references are not a positive sign either.  It has greatly hurt the feelings of the international students in China especially for those who is currently a student or alumni in this university.
attributes.background: We would demand the demolish of those pro-Tibetan independence artworks in the university in order to bring back an academic-oriented student environment for the university and the chinese students.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the University of the Arts London.
